attributes.action: All Gov petitions must be signed off by MPs name and party.
attributes.additional_details: I do not always feel represented, and believe some responses to petitions are AI generated. I would like to know that the outcomes of debates are being conducted by MPs who understand the topic. For example, it is unproductive to have MPs who may have a working knowledge about roads and congestion debating maternity services.
attributes.background: I want to see the names of the elected MPs and which parties they represent. I  believe this is a democratic right.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can look up all MPs and their parties here: https://members.parliament.uk/members/commons

You can read transcripts of petition debates on Hansard and watch them on YouTube and parliamentlive.tv.
